title: Justin Bieber dropping a new album later this year
text:
Cape Town – Justin Bieber has sent fans wild by announcing he'll be releasing an album before 2020.

The newlywed – who married Hailey Baldwin last month in a lavish ceremony – hasn't released solo music since his 2015 Purpose album which featured chart-toppers like Sorry and What Do You Mean?

He has, however, featured on several collabs like DJ Khaled's No Brainer last year, Ed Sheeran's I Don't Care, and a remix of Billie Eilish's bad guy.

Justin posted a video of himself recording, skating around his kitchen before he revealed: "Album coming out this year. Another song coming out... soon."

Compiled by Alex Isaacs (Sources: Channel24, NME)
description: Justin Bieber has sent fans wild by announcing he'll be releasing an album before 2020.
